name: Homegear::deleteFamilySetting
shortDescription: Deletes a family setting from database
description: This method deletes a family setting from the database. The family settings files are not modified. If the setting doesn't exist, nothing happens.

parameters.name: familyId
parameters.description: The family ID to delete the setting for

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the setting to delete. Use lower characters only here.
